Posts.EditableText: I wrote some notes in the standard Notebook, then my battery got out of my computer, and when started, my notes where gone. I didn't save it, but is it possible to recover through Recuva? If so, what should I look for? There's hundreds of thousand files to recover... If you didn't save it then it's gone. You might have success if the application stores a temporary copy of what you were working on, you'd be prompted by the application (such as Word) the next time you opened it up to recover it. Please Help ! Thanks ! I didn't find the right solution from the internet. References: - https://www.computerforum.com/threads/recover-notebook-text-from-recuva.24254865132/ - Case study example
Posts.HTML:
I wrote some notes in the standard Notebook, then my battery got out of my computer, and when started, my notes where gone. I didn't save it, but is it possible to recover through Recuva? If so, what should I look for? There's hundreds of thousand files to recover...
If you didn't save it then it's gone. You might have success if the application stores a temporary copy of what you were working on, you'd be prompted by the application (such as Word) the next time you opened it up to recover it.
Please Help !
Thanks !
I didn't find the right solution from the internet.
References:

  • https://www.computerforum.com/threads/recover-notebook-text-from-recuva.24254865132/
